text: whwla' aladhin 'aeraduu walam yuminuu biallah wytbeu rusulah hum aladhin ykhtarwn alhayat aldunya alfanyt, wytrkwn alakhirat albaqyt, wayamnaeun alnaas ean aitibae din allh, wyrydwnh tryqana mewjana lywafq ahwa'hm, 'uwlayik almwswfwn bhdhh alsfat fi dalal ean alhaqu baeid ean kl 'asbab alhdayt
